test1.testCaseDesc: Test:1 GIVEN Primary Member WHEN requesting to view his or her claim records THEN should be able to view all his claim records.

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is requesting for his or her records.

test2.testCaseDesc: Test:2  GIVEN Adult Member WHEN requesting to view his or her claim records THEN should be able to view all his claim records â€” Multiple Procedure Count scenario

verify.detailedDescription: Person is not in the given contract. Person is not authorized to view the Enrollee's records.

test3.testCaseDesc: Test:3  GIVEN Child Member WHEN requesting to view his or her claim records THEN should be able to view all his claim records

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is requesting for his or her records.

test4.testCaseDesc: Test:4 GIVEN Adult Member WHEN requesting to view his or her claim records THEN should be able to view all his claim records

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is requesting for his or her records.

test5.testCaseDesc: Test:5 GIVEN Primary Adult Member WHEN requesting to view his or her Child's claim records THEN should be able to view all his claim records.

verify.message: Omnibus-rule: Person is an Adult and is requesting for child dependent's records.

test6.testCaseDesc: Test:6 GIVEN Non-Primary Adult Member WHEN requesting to view a Child's claim records in the plan THEN should NOT be able to view all his claim records.

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is a primary member. However, this member has no permission to view this enrollee's details.

test7.testCaseDesc: Test:7 GIVEN Child Member WHEN requesting to view other Child's claim records THEN should NOT be allowed to view other child's claim record.

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is a child. A Child can't see other members records.

test8.testCaseDesc: Test:8 Given Primary member (Omnibus rule) WHEN requesting to view other Adult member who has granted permission (Omnibus rule) THEN should be allowed to view claim records

verify.message: Omnibus-rule: Person is not an primary Adult and is requesting for child dependent's records.

test9.testCaseDesc: Test:9 Given Primary member (Omnibus rule) WHEN requesting to view other Adult member who have NOT granted permission (Omnibus rule) THEN should NOT be allowed to view claim records

verify.message: Omnibus-rule: Person is not an primary Adult and is requesting for child dependent's records.

test10.testCaseDesc: Test:10 Given an ADULT dependent (Omnibus rule) WHEN requesting to view other Adult member claims THEN should NOT be allowed to view claim records

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is not a primary member. He/She can't view other adult enrollee's records.

test11.testCaseDesc: Test:11 Given a PRIMARY member WHEN requesting to view other Adult member who is not part of the same contract as PRIMARY THEN should NOT be allowed to view claim records and indicate the person is not part of the contract

verify.detailedDescription: Person is not in the given contract. Person is not authorized to view the Enrollee's records.

test12.testCaseDesc: Test:12 Given Adult member WHEN requesting to view other members NOT in this current contract THEN should NOT be allowed to view claim records and should raise security alert.

verify.detailedDescription: Person is not in the given contract. Person is not authorized to view the Enrollee's records.

test13.testCaseDesc: Test:13 Invalid Person ID or Enrollee ID

verify.detailedDescription: Person is not in the given contract. Person is not authorized to view the Enrollee's records.

verify.message: Security violation. Expected security headers are missing.

test16.testCaseDesc: Test:16 Inactive Provider Scenario in DIT

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is requesting for his or her records.

test17.testCaseDesc: Test:17 Inactive Provider Scenario in DIT

verify.message: Omnibus-rule:Person is requesting for his or her records.
